body_html:
This is ready for review. The only test failures are the same failures that are in #11789.

Reasons for some changes:

  • protobuf -> protobuf_archive because //external:protobuf is now depended on in grpc. That needs to be a bind rule, unfortunately.
  • grpc.patch and the grpc cmake files are only needed until these pull requests are submitted:
    grpc/grpc#11944
    grpc/grpc#11933

Once those are submitted, then we can switch to the BUILD and cmake files that are in the grpc repo.

  • A bunch of classes were renamed. See b/62910646

Once those are submitted, then we can switch to the BUILD and cmake files that are in the grpc repo.

A bunch of classes were renamed. See b/62910646
body:
This is ready for review. The only test failures are the same failures that are in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/11789.

Reasons for some changes:
- protobuf -> protobuf_archive because //external:protobuf is now depended on in grpc. That needs to be a bind rule, unfortunately.
- grpc.patch and the grpc cmake files are only needed until these pull requests are submitted:
https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/11944
https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/11933

Once those are submitted, then we can switch to the BUILD and cmake files that are in the grpc repo.
- A bunch of classes were renamed. See b/62910646
